views.templates

Class DominoView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class DominoView
extends javafx.scene.Parent
    JavaFX view of a Domino.
